instruction: create a self fueling coal mining system using burner inserters and transport belts
objective: create a self fueling coal mining system using burner inserters and transport belts
steps:
To create a self-fueling coal mining system using burner inserters and transport belts in Factorio, you can follow this plan:

1. Find a coal patch: Locate a suitable coal deposit to start your mining operation.

2. Place burner mining drills: Position several burner mining drills directly on the coal patch. These will mine the coal without requiring electricity.

3. Set up burner inserters: Place burner inserters next to each burner mining drill. Configure them to take coal from the mining drill's output and insert it back into the drill's fuel slot. This creates a self-fueling loop for the mining drills.

4. Create a coal collection system:
   a. Place transport belts in front of the burner mining drills to collect the excess coal not used for fueling.
   b. Arrange the belts to form a main line that collects coal from all the drills.

5. Add additional burner inserters: Place burner inserters along the transport belt line to keep it running. Configure these inserters to:
   a. Pick up coal from the belt.
   b. Insert coal into their own fuel slots.
   c. Place excess coal back onto the belt.

6. Create a coal storage area: At the end of your belt line, set up some wooden chests or steel chests to store the excess coal for later use.

7. Optimization:
   a. Ensure that the burner inserters feeding the mining drills have priority over those feeding the belt system.
   b. Consider creating loops or branches in your belt system to maximize coal distribution.

8. Expansion: As you gather more resources, gradually replace burner inserters with electric inserters and add more mining drills to increase production.

This system will continuously mine coal, use some to fuel itself, and output excess coal for other uses in your factory. It's an excellent starting point for early-game power generation and resource gathering in Factorio.

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill_position = coal_patch.bounding_box.center
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.DOWN, position=drill_position)
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill
inserter_position = Position(x=drill.position.x + 1, y=drill.position.y)
inserter = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, direction=Direction.LEFT, position=inserter_position)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt in front of the drill
belt_position = Position(x=drill.position.x, y=drill.position.y + 1)
belt = place_entity(Prototype.TransportBelt, direction=Direction.RIGHT, position=belt_position)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest_position = Position(x=belt.position.x + 1, y=belt.position.y)
chest = place_entity(Prototype.WoodenChest, position=chest_position)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(10)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.DOWN, position=Position(x=0, y=0))
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill
inserter = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, drill.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt in front of the drill
belt = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.TransportBelt, drill.position, direction=Direction.DOWN)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, belt.position, direction=Direction.DOWN)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert some coal into the drill to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the drill")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(10)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.DOWN, position=coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill, facing the drill
inserter = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, drill.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.LEFT)
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt in front of the drill
belt = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.TransportBelt, drill.position, direction=Direction.DOWN)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, belt.position, direction=Direction.DOWN)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert some coal into the drill to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the drill")

# Insert some coal into the inserter to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the inserter")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(60)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.RIGHT, position=coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill's output
inserter = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, drill.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.LEFT)
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt next to the inserter
belt = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.TransportBelt, inserter.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, belt.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert some coal into the drill to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the drill")

# Insert some coal into the inserter to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the inserter")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(120)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.RIGHT, position=Position(x=0, y=0))
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill's output
inserter = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, drill.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.LEFT)
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt next to the inserter
belt = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.TransportBelt, inserter.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, belt.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert coal into the drill and inserter to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=5)
print("Inserted initial coal into the drill and inserter")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(60)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.RIGHT, position=coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter next to the drill's output
inserter = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, drill.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.LEFT)
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place transport belt next to the inserter
belt = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.TransportBelt, inserter.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert belt is not None, "Failed to place transport belt"
print(f"Placed transport belt at {belt.position}")

# Place chest at the end of the belt
chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, belt.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place wooden chest"
print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert coal into the drill and inserter to start the process
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=10)
print("Inserted initial coal into the drill and inserter")

# Wait for the system to start working
sleep(120)

# Verify that coal is being mined and transported
drill_inventory = inspect_inventory(drill)
assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Coal is not being transported to the chest"

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

print(f"Placed wooden chest at {chest.position}")

print("Self-fueling coal mining system created successfully!")

# Find the nearest coal patch
coal_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.Coal, nearest(Resource.Coal))
assert coal_patch is not None, "No coal patch found nearby"

# Move to the coal patch
move_to(coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
print(f"Moved to coal patch at {coal_patch.bounding_box.center}")

# Place burner mining drill on the coal patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, direction=Direction.DOWN, position=coal_patch.bounding_box.center)
assert drill is not None, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Placed burner mining drill at {drill.position}")

# Place burner inserter directly in front of the drill's output
inserter_position = Position(x=drill.position.x, y=drill.position.y + 1)
inserter = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, direction=Direction.RIGHT, position=inserter_position)
assert inserter is not None, "Failed to place burner inserter"
print(f"Placed burner inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Place iron chest next to the inserter (using IronChest instead of WoodenChest)
chest_position = Position(x=inserter.position.x + 1, y=inserter.position.y)
chest = place_entity(Prototype.IronChest, position=chest_position)
assert chest is not None, "Failed to place iron chest"
print(f"Placed iron chest at {chest.position}")

# Insert coal into the drill and inserter to start the process

assert drill_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Drill is not mining coal"

inserter_inventory = inspect_inventory(inserter)
assert inserter_inventory.get(Prototype.Coal) > 0, "Inserter is not picking up coal"

chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(chest)
